QuestData.Title: Send a Message
QuestData.Description: The Oomlot leader, Yngwie, is too powerful to be left alive. He's barking nonsense from the raised west side of the village, across the rope bridge.$B$BGo up there and get him before he sends the rest of the village against us.$B$BPiece of cake!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Send them a message they'll never forget.
QuestData.RewardText: Nice work, $g bud : girlfriend;! Hope he wasn't too tough.
